function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contamination of living spaces due to external clothing and footwear being brought indoors","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases within the living spaces","Mitigation":"Implement a designated containment space for shedding and storing external clothing and footwear, and use contactless options for functionality","Technologies":"High-intensity UV-C light for sterilization, motion-activated lights, motion-activated water taps/faucets","People":"Occupants of the house","Owner":"Homeowners, architects, and interior designers"},{"Description":"Inadequate hand hygiene facilities and access to wet cells (bathrooms) in proximity to the living space","Impact":"Risk of inadequate hand hygiene leading to the spread of viruses within the living space","Mitigation":"Include a sink with running warm water in the containment space for hand washing, prioritize contactless options for functionality","Technologies":"Motion-activated water taps/faucets","People":"Occupants of the dwelling","Owner":"Homeowners, architects, and interior designers"}]}
